website_summaries.verdict: Hugely popular go-to blush that leads the pack. The brand's signature color "Orgasm" works on everyone.
pros: Matte or shimmer subtle pinks with blush undertones for a natural flush
A range of raunchily-named iconic colors like the award-winning Orgasm, a pink-peach with golden shimmer that works on just about anyone
cons: Not a bold color, so needs to be built up for a more pronounced look

customer_reviews.title: Color not right for me--only con
customer_reviews.text: Color is the only reason for this low rating. The color in the compact looks fantastic, but didn't do anything for me. Must be gorgeous on the right complexions. Mine has yellow/olive undertones.
customer_reviews.author: DJD of Mesa

customer_reviews.title: One of the most beautiful blushes I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: ORGASM, One of the most beautiful blushes I've ever used! In fact, i have not used any of my other blushes since I received NARS! The NARS brand for which I've never used any of other than a lip color that is equally beautiful. Im looking forward to trying other NARS product's
customer_reviews.author: Thedirtdigger

customer_reviews.title: A Classic For a Good Reason
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this color blush ever since it first came out. A classic that blends with all kinds of complexions and provides a natural-looking blush.
customer_reviews.author: LTinPDX

customer_reviews.title: great color and texture...a little goes a long way so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing NARS cosmetics and I am happy that I made the decision. It is similar to MK's shy blush in my opinion, but you don't have to put as much on for the color to show up. It goes on smoothly and blends nicely. The blush compact doesn't crack easily like some. I don't dislike anything about this product but the price. I think it's worth it though for the color, long lasting, and how I won't need to buy it again for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KScho

customer_reviews.title: Color is off. Beware before buying!
customer_reviews.text: Thev product I felt was not as described. The color was offf. I only wish I could return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Great color which compliments most skin tones. Completely natural looking, like after working out...or you know...the name of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Lavade

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but I dont love being lied to and paying full price for a travel or mini size. I should of read every little line and read all the reviews, no matter how stressed or tired I was, They say it is a 16 oz full size compact. It is NOT the 32 oz which is the true full size. Thankyou Nars cosmetics for the beautiful shades
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Trumble

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color blush. It’s got ‘sparkles’ which I’m not crazy about but it not much. Have bought it over and over. Lipstick too
customer_reviews.author: Ann T

customer_reviews.title: I like this blush but I'm not nutso over it the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this blush but I'm not nutso over it the way everyone else is. The only time I wear it is in the summer, since I'm a natural blonde. It's a littlle too peachy for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: still good Blush.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nars for some time now. It appears that this time it was lighter than usual. still good Blush.
customer_reviews.author: DenKon0310

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable blush that gives me just the right amount of color that I'm looking for. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Best blush color!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for almost any skin tone. Buidable color for light to darker application.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Blends beautifully with skin tones
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blush I have ever used. It is not too bright or too pink. It blends nicely with my skin tones and seems to go well with any color outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product hand delivered!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but becuz of COVID, was unable to go to Sephora. Amazon delivered it right to my front door and I paid the same price I pay at Sophora! Amazon, you rock!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great color for fair skinned!
customer_reviews.text: Makes your cheeks look like you just got done running. Very natural and pretty for fair skinned people.
customer_reviews.author: Dot dot dash dash

customer_reviews.title: This is my desert island must have
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this blush for 10 yrs plus. Get compliments every time.
customer_reviews.author: Roylyn Long

customer_reviews.title: Light and subtle
customer_reviews.text: I have dark-olive complexion and I love a slightly pink cheek. Also looks good on my fair skin sister.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Marantz

customer_reviews.title: Color purchased was not color received. Can't use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the regular color and received the "super" version - completely different color and full of gold glitter that gets everywhere. Didnt realize this until mine ran out I opened this product. Cant use this blush & its now past the return date. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Real Nars?
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if this is legit Nars brand, as the color seems slightly different than I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Should have gone with a lighter color
customer_reviews.text: I love Nars blush and it's a bit darker than I thought so I just add a little pink over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Works with my skin tone; no kewpie doll look.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make me look like a kewpie doll. Gives me a slight, believable blush.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BLUSH. !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love all NARS products and this blush does not disappoint - amazing shade!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is about
customer_reviews.text: I love Nar product. However, this one, for me, was SO, SO.
customer_reviews.author: dearydew

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, natural color
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite blush - not too pink, not too peachy - just a lovely natural glow.
customer_reviews.author: happygirlgail

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for my pastey skin. I rarely go outside so this makes it look like I got some sun...
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Blush
customer_reviews.text: Just used the blush once. So far It seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gail B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This blush is THE PERFECT COLOR, winter or summer. It’s easy to layer so you can adjust intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this goes on well looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this goes on well looks great. Adds a pinkish glow
customer_reviews.author: Fred Karimi

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: This blush is just perfect! I love the color and it stays on all day. What more could you want?!
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color.
customer_reviews.text: The best blush. Been using it for years. Occasionally I run out and will grab something random to try and I always regret it and come back for this. It’s the right shade, pink and intensity for my super pale skin. Sephora was out the last time i went and the sales girl joked that there were about to Be riots because everyone loves this. This seems like an authentic product for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't heard of this product yet, I don't know where you have been. This is such an awesome color and it appears to look great on all different types of skin colors. I happen to have a very light complexion myself. I have run two different containers of this down to the case. This is my go-to blush!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very natural
customer_reviews.text: I'm a redhead going gray. I have worn this color for years and find it perfect for my fair skin tone and hair. It's very natural looking. I don't wear foundation, so it doesn't hide my freckles.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Subtlely, orgasmic
customer_reviews.text: I have always love this cult classic peach universal blush. However, it seems that the one I bought from Amazon seems less saturated in color than the ones I usually buy from Sephora? Usually I only have to swipe once, but with this particular one, multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: FitSojourner

customer_reviews.title: Great blush for day and night
customer_reviews.text: Great blush for day and night, at night I just apply a little heavier. It gives color and highlights at the same time, never looks over-applied. I also swipe some on my eyelids and then just wear mascara & powder when I'm in a rush or not wanting a heavy makeup look.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M Vanderlei

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty, but it is smaller than my last purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot smaller than the one I bought through Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: ZAMSKY

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush! This is the 3rd time I have ordered this color but it's the first time I have ordered from Amazon. It came promptly and was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I arrived sooner than we thought. And, my wife loves it! What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Doug Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blush!
customer_reviews.text: I found my colorant use this luscious product all the time! Gives a soft natural glow that is very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Leick

customer_reviews.title: Best blush ever
customer_reviews.text: Best blush ever!!! I’ve been using it for years and will never use a different brand this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mata G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite blush color. Will buy again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: MGL

customer_reviews.title: Best blush
customer_reviews.text: Now I see why voted best blush-looks great with all skin tones and has a nice glow
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush! Great color with a touch of sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Here's the Scoop...!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite blush. It has some sparkle to it.
customer_reviews.author: Norskigirl

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small but beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Best blush I’ve ever bought. It’s kind of small but beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This color is perfect for just about everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, love the color...hate the price! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok it is the best blush ever
customer_reviews.text: had to try it. i kept hearing and reading about it and its all true. its wonderful. mine was full size, don't know why some people got a trial size.
customer_reviews.author: janae

product_meta.title: NARS Blush Orgasm
product_meta.description: Color:ORGASMThe ultimate authority in blush, NARS offers the industry's most iconic shades for cheeks. Natural, healthy-looking color that immediately enlivens the complexion. A light application of even the highest-intensity hues delivers a natural-looking flush.
feature_bullets: Color: ORGASM (peachy pink with golden shimmer)
A soft and sheer, pressed powder blush in a perennially pleasing, universally flattering shade
Micronized powder ensures soft, blendable application
A cult classic adored by both makeup artists and beauty editors alike

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
